topic: Why is this happening in my renders?
body:
Ok,, my renders internally are doing odd things. The inside of the
chapter house im modelling I would expect to be a little orangey as the
textures are orangy-ish colour. Which is what I get when I do a render
then run pcond -s, its too dark really for an unfiltered render:


https://www.bris.ac.uk/fluff/u/js0754/0j8_md0p1NAu1fdWB6pt8A7o/12hrinter
nal-s.jpg


But when I run pcond -h the renders come out very grey, any idea why
this is? Is it correct, is it something to do with the light levels, or
contrast forcing it to grey?


https://www.bris.ac.uk/fluff/u/js0754/2u4diWLd_7Kih_chtUlZTA7o/12hrinter
nal-h.jpg


If it is meant to be like this then why? Any ideas


John
___
